venues.title: Rochester Public Market
venues.description: Rochester's Public Market has served the community since 1905. Bargains abound Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday, 52 weeks a year. Local vendors offer their fresh produce, ethnic delicacies, specialty items, and so much more. In addition, an array of independent local businesses are anchored on Market grounds and in the surrounding Market District.
venues.additionalInfo: Volunteer info on the Friends of the Public Market would go here.
venues.volunteerInfo:
Please volunteer and support the Rochester Public Market by becoming part of the Friends of the Rochester Public Market.

Find us online at: http://www.marketfriends.org

Email us at: marketfriends@rochester.rr.com

Also find us on: facebook.com/friendsoftherochesterpublicmarket

venues.title: South Wedge Farmers' Market
venues.description: South Wedge Farmer's Market is a small weekly summer/fall farmers market behind Boulder Coffee Co. in the South Wedge, the South Wedge Farmers' Market embraces the grow local, eat local doctrine in sustainability, sourcing vendors and foods only from within 100 miles. Many vendors also sell organic produce, meats, wine and foods. It has space for just over two dozen vendors. Their Facebook page notes the varying list of vendors. EBT welcome.

venues.address: Brighton High School lot, 1150 Winton Rd. South
